name: goaltrick-dapp

scripts.build-client: npm run clean && parcel build client/src/index.html --out-dir client/dist
scripts.dev-client: npm run clean && parcel client/src/index.html --out-dir client/dist

author: Sportiverse Labs
description: Goaltrick is the first dApp of Sportiverse and a powerful demonstration of what the ecosystem can achieve. It is a decentralized football social network that connects everyone, democratizing and expanding access to the real-world football scene through the power of Web3.
